operation.command: select 1 from sgencli.cli_prestation_familiale pf where pf.matricule_assure = 9999999 and pf.histo_numero_prestation = 2099000099999 and pf.type_prestation = 'AF_SOLIDARITE' and montant_reglement=99999
delete from sgencli.cli_prestation_familiale pf where pf.matricule_assure = 9999999 and pf.histo_numero_prestation = 2099000099999 and pf.type_prestation = 'AF_SOLIDARITE' and montant_reglement=99999
delete from sgendif.dif_notification dn where trim(dn.numero_assure) = '9999999' and dn.type = 'CLI_PRESTATION_FAMILIALE' and dn.statut='A_TRAITER'
